comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: The Royal Exchange is the building on the right. www.infobritain.co.uk/Royal_Exchange_London.htm The building on the left is part of the Bank of England.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.images-of-london.co.uk/jss/product.php?xProd=19 is of the same space in the same period. It has a link to a modern photo at www.images-of-london.co.uk/todayImage/bank.jpg The two sets of railings are for stairs going down to the tube (the London Underground). This is the Bank station.
